query: Which companies (provide names) within Hillman Solutions estimatedbudget should be aquired in 2025?
guidelines: The report MUST have at least 3 different sources for citations
Each sub section MUST include supporting sources using hyperlinks. If none exist, erase the sub section or rewrite it to be a part of the previous section
The report must be split into sections and subsections with clear headings and sub-headings
If the report contains information that would be better represented in a table, use a table to represent the data (Markdown table)
Make sure no placeholder text or data is left in the report (Company A, Company B, etc) Actual specific data must be included.
